issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Don't use ExecutionError in Flight SQL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16217](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16217). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is meant for Gandiva, we should use a more relevant error
